meanings.definition: A Japanese multinational corporation known for manufacturing automobiles, motorcycles, and power equipment.
meanings.sent1: My dad drives a Honda car to work every day.
meanings.sent2: The Honda company is famous for its reliable vehicles.
meanings.sent3: Why did the Honda car bring a sandwich to the race? To fuel up!
meanings.sent4: Her love for Honda cars was like a magnet, pulling her to every dealership.
meanings.sent5: The bright red Honda in the showroom gleamed like a polished gem.

meanings.definition: A type of motorcycle or automobile produced by Honda.
meanings.sent1: I dream of owning a Honda motorcycle one day.
meanings.sent2: The Honda Civic is a popular choice for many drivers.
meanings.sent3: The Honda car and motorcycle had a friendly race down the street.
meanings.sent4: Her Honda motorcycle roared like a lion on the open road.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the Honda car turned heads wherever it went.

meanings.definition: A unit of power equal to 745.7 watts.
meanings.sent1: The light bulb required one Honda of power to shine brightly.
meanings.sent2: The motor needed a Honda to operate at full capacity.
meanings.sent3: Why did the toaster ask for a Honda of power? It wanted to toast faster!
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was a Honda that powered her through the project.
meanings.sent5: The Honda of energy in the room was palpable, driving everyone to action.
